value.name: 104th Birthday For Loretta Crush
value.description: Pictured from left to right are Loretta’s grandson, Gary Page, granddaughter, Lisa Slaga, daughter Nancy Carey, and son, Fred Page.

value.name: Gary Mortimer
value.description: Founder and Editor of sUAS News | Gary Mortimer has been a commercial balloon pilot for 25 years and also flies full-size helicopters. Prior to that, he made tea and coffee in air traffic control towers across the UK as a member of the Royal Air Force.
